item.title: Help with AttackNPC Method
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

[quote=“Jorsa, post:3, topic:159427”]maybe its not working cos servers suck.
every time someone clicks anything, or the client sends anything to the server at all. the packet processing method is activated, thus decreasing the “timer” counter. It is also activated every 500ms.[/quote]

If servers suck gtfo, why would you want to waste your time?

And @Woofdawg, it goes at the same speed at practically any wepdelay and PkingDelay.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with AttackNPC Method
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

Ok i have this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4153)) // Granite Maul
{
PkingDelay = 500;
wepdelay = 500;
}

And i have this at the start of the AttackNPC Method:

if(PkingDelay <= 0 && wepdelay <= 0){

But you can still mass with it -.-

What effects the mass hitting? Thanks.

Read full topic
